name: Y.E.T.I
description:
Y.E.T.I is a third-person shooting game that focuses on the classic shooting and precision mechanics.

Fight against anything that threatens humanity.

Or rather, whatever the government says that threatens humanity.

You play as an investigation agent, involved in special missions.

Officially: You do not exist and so are the nightmares you face.

Experiment gone wrong? Alien forms of life? Other agents went rogue?

It is your job to keep it under the wraps, so it never reaches the public.

Land, get the intel, eliminate. Life is simple.

Shooting mechanics aimed at precision in landing headshots



Shooting gameplay aimed at finding enemy weakness
